ability.Moody: Raises a random stat by 2 stages and lowers another stat by 1 stage at the end of each turn.
ability.Mirage Shield: Any damage over 50% of this Pokemon's maximum HP is reduced by half.

Psychic.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Play Rough.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.

Astral Beam.effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

Mind Shield.effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
